attributes.background: This petition is to try very hard to get rid of bullys. They are people who hurt people verbally and physically to make themselves feel better. I think we need teachers to take it more seriously because people tell them it's happening but most teachers dont take it seriously. Bullying is horrible and deserves to be stopped!
